Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hah‐hah‐ha, dos trinta e seis estratagemas, fugir é o melhor...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哈、哈哈，三十六計，走為上計…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哈、哈哈，三十六计，走为上计…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hah-hah-ha, in un posto stretto, scappare è vittoria...!"

Steam (ST): The three of them ran into the depths of the mansion at full tilt. That pair of furniture calmly watched them go.
Umineko Project (UP): The three of them escaped into the depths of the mansion at full tilt.{n}The two furniture calmly watched them go.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The three of them escaped into the depths of the mansion at full tilt. The two furniture calmly watched them go.
PC Japanese (JP): ３人は屋敷の奥へ一目散に逃げ出す。家具の二人は悠然とその背中を見送る。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ３人は屋敷の奥へ一目散に逃げ出す。{n}家具の二人は悠然とその背中を見送る。
Russian (RU): Троица на полной скорости ринулась вглубь особняка.{n}Мебель же спокойно наблюдала их побег.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os três escaparam para as profundezas da mansão em pleno tumulto.{n}As duas mobílias calmamente os observaram indo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 三人向大屋深處一溜煙地逃跑了。{n}兩位家具悠然目送著他們的背影。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 三人向大屋深处一溜烟地逃跑了。{n}两位家具悠然目送着他们的背影。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Loro tre scapparono all'interno della villa a tutta velocità. I due mobili li guardarono tranquillamente andare via.

Speaker: Leviathan
Steam (ST): "...I'll kill the woman. You take the man!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......I'll kill the woman. You take the man!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……私は女の方を殺るわ。あんたは男を！」
Russian (RU): "......Я убью женщину. Ты займись мужчиной!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eu mato a mulher. Você pega o homem!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我殺那個女的。你殺男的！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我杀那个女的。你杀男的！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Io ucciderò la donna. Tu occupati dell'uomo!"

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "Understood."
Umineko Project (UP): "Understood."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「了解した。」
Russian (RU): "Поняла."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Entendido."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「了解。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ho capito."

Steam (ST): The furniture in the shadows of the pillars and on the chandelier made their figures explode, and, leaving behind only the sound of a hopping beetle knocking against the wall, they pursued their respective targets.
Umineko Project (UP): The two pieces of furniture in the shadow of the pillar and on the chandelier burst apart their humanlike forms, and, leaving behind only the sound of hopping beetles colliding with the walls, they pursued their respective targets.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The two furniture in the shadows of the pillars and on the chandelier made their figures explode, and, leaving behind only the sound of a hopping beetle knocking against the wall, they pursued their respective targets.
PC Japanese (JP): 柱の影とシャンデリア上の２人の家具は、人の姿を弾けさせ、飛び跳ねる甲虫が壁にぶつかるような音だけを残しながら、各々の標的を追跡する。
Russian (RU): Мебель в тени колонн и мебель на канделябре взорвались, и, оставляя после себя звуки жука‐попрыгунчика, бьющегося о стены, бросились в погоню за своими целями.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As duas peças de mobília, uma na sombra do pilar e a outra no candelabro, explodiram suas formas humanoides e, deixando para trás apenas o som de besouros saltitantes colidindo com as paredes, elas perseguiram seus respectivos alvos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在柱影中與吊燈上的兩位家具，爆散人形，僅僅留下好似亂彈的甲虫撞上牆壁般的聲音，追往各自的目標。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在柱影中与吊灯上的两位家具，爆散人形，仅仅留下好似乱弹的甲虫撞上墙壁般的声音，追往各自的目标。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I due mobili all'ombra dei pilastri e del candelabro fecero esplodere le loro sagome, e, lasciandosi dietro solo il suono di un insetto saltellante che sbatte contro una parete, inseguirono i loro rispettivi bersagli.

Steam (ST): Their speed was overwhelming, and they easily blocked the others' paths of retreat.
Umineko Project (UP): Their speed was overwhelming, and they easily blocked the others' path of retreat.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Their speed was overwhelming, and they easily blocked the others' path of retreat.
PC Japanese (JP): その速度は圧倒的で、容易に彼らの退路を断ってしまうのだ。
Russian (RU): Их скорость была невероятной, и они с лёгкостью заблокировали пути к отступлению.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua velocidade era avassaladora, e elas facilmente bloquearam o caminho de recuo deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 壓倒性的速度，輕而易舉地斷絕了他們的退路。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 压倒性的速度，轻而易举地断绝了他们的退路。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La loro velocità era travolgente, e bloccarono facilmente il percorso di fuga degli altri.

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "......Let's see what this furniture's got. I hope they're at least able to amuse me..."
Umineko Project (UP): "............I'll inspect their skill as furniture. It'd be nice if they entertained me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............Why don't I watch the skill of this furniture. It'd be nice if they entertained me..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………家具のお手並み、拝見させてもらうわ。楽しませてくれるといいのだけど。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………家具のお手並み、拝見させてもらうわ。楽しませてくれるといいのだけど」
Russian (RU): "............Почему бы мне не оценить навыки этой мебели. Хорошо бы, если бы им удалось развлечь меня..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Inspecionarei a habilidade delas como mobília. Seria legal se elas me entretessem."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………我就看看家具們的能耐吧。但願能看得開心。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………我就看看家具们的能耐吧。但愿能看得开心。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Perché non guardare l'abilità di questi mobili. Sarebbe carino se mi facessero divertire..."

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): "{f:5:Beatrice}-sama, it may not be prudent for you to reveal your form unnecessarily..."
Umineko Project (UP): "{f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, I might suggest it wise not to show yourself carelessly..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Beatrice-sama, I wonder if it is appropriate for you to show yourself unnecessarily..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ベアトリーチェさま、濫りに姿を現されない方がよろしいかと…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ベアトリーチェさま、濫りに姿を現されない方がよろしいかと…」
Russian (RU): "{f:5:Беатриче}‐сама, стоит ли вам являть себя без необходимости?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "{f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, devo sugerir que talvez seja sábio não mostrar‐se descuidadamente..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「貝阿朵莉切夫人，還是別輕率現身為好哦…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「贝阿朵莉切夫人，还是别轻率现身为好哦…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Beatrice-sama, mi chiedo se è appropriato per voi mostrarvi inutilmente..."

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "And you don't unnecessarily move your king away from the center. That's part of a monarch's... ...and a witch's dignity!"
Umineko Project (UP): "A king doesn't carelessly wander about the center. That's part of a king's—a witch's dignity!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You don't unnecessarily move the king into the center. That's part of a king's, ...a witch's dignity!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「キングは濫りに中央を動かないものよ。それが王者の、…魔女の貫禄よ！」
Russian (RU): "Тебе не обязательно перемещать короля в центр. Такова часть королевского, ведьмовского достоинства!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Um rei não vaga descuidadamente pelo centro. Essa é parte da dignidade de um rei — de uma bruxa!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「國王就是要目空一切地居中央而不動。這就是王者，…魔女的威風喲！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「国王就是要目空一切地居中央而不动。这就是王者，…魔女的威风哟！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non si deve necessariamente muovere il re al centro. Questa è parte della dignità di un re... di una strega!"

Steam (ST): Belphegor was already blocking the way in front of Rudolf, who had boldly tried to escape to the second floor.
Umineko Project (UP): In front of Rudolf, who had boldly tried to escape to the second floor, Belphegor was already standing in the way.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 大胆にも２階へ逃れようとした留弗夫の前には、もうベルフェゴールが立ち塞がっていた。
Russian (RU): Перед Рудольфом, отважно пытавшимся убежать на второй этаж, уже стояла Вельфегор.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na frente de Rudolf, que tinha audaciosamente tentado escapar para o segundo andar, Belphegor já estava parada no caminho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在大膽選擇從二樓逃跑的留弗夫面前，貝露菲格露擋住了他的去路。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在大胆选择从二楼逃跑的留弗夫面前，贝露菲格露挡住了他的去路。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Di fronte a Rudolf, che aveva coraggiosamente provato a scappare al secondo piano, c'era Belphegor che gli bloccava la strada.

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "It's useless to try and resist or escape. ...You don't need to think about anything. Just close your eyes. I'll gently end it all for you."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's useless to try and resist or escape. ......You don't need to think about anything. Just close your eyes. I'll bring everything to a gentle finish."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It's useless to try and resist or escape. ......You don't need to think about anything. Just close your eyes. I'll gently end everything."
PC Japanese (JP): 「抵抗も、そして逃走も無駄だ。……お前は何も考えなくていい。ただ目を閉じているだけでいい。私が全て、やさしく終わらせてやる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「抵抗も、そして逃走も無駄だ。……お前は何も考えなくていい。ただ目を閉じているだけでいい。私が全て、やさしく終わらせてやる」
Russian (RU): "Пытаться сопротивляться и сбежать бесполезно. ......Тебе не нужно ни о чём задумываться. Просто закрой глаза. А я нежно сделаю своё дело."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É inútil tentar resistir ou escapar. ......Você não precisa pensar sobre nada.{n}Apenas feche seus olhos. Trarei tudo a um final gentil."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「抵抗，還有逃跑，都是沒有用的。……你什麼都不用想。只用閉上眼睛就行了。我會溫柔地了結一切。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「抵抗，还有逃跑，都是没有用的。……你什么都不用想。只用闭上眼睛就行了。我会温柔地了结一切。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È inutile provare a resistere o scappare. ... Non hai bisogno di pensare a niente. Chiudi gli occhi e basta. Farò dolcemente finire ogni cosa."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "You'd make a good wife. Husbands love to hear that kind of thing when they come home all tired."
Umineko Project (UP): "You'd make a good wife. Your husband would be pleased to hear that kind of thing when he comes home tired."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You might become a good wife. Your husband would be pleased to hear that kind of thing when he comes home tired."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あんた、いい嫁さんになれるな。疲れて帰ってくる旦那はそういうの喜ぶぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あんた、いい嫁さんになれるな。疲れて帰ってくる旦那はそういうの喜ぶぜ」
Russian (RU): "Ты можешь стать хорошей женой. Твой муж был бы рад услышать подобные слова по возращении домой уставшим."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você... daria uma boa esposa. Seu marido ficaria contente de ouvir esse tipo de coisa quando ele voltasse para casa cansado."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你能當個好媳婦兒呢。疲憊歸家的一家之主，可喜歡這一套了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你能当个好媳妇儿呢。疲惫归家的一家之主，可喜欢这一套了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Potresti diventare una buona moglie. Tuo marito sarebbe lieto di sentirti dire certe cose quando torna stanco a casa."

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "To think you're still relaxed enough to speak with such insolence at a time like this...!
Umineko Project (UP): "To think that you're still relaxed enough to speak such vulgarity at a time like this...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "To think that you're still relaxed enough to speak with such insolence at a time like this...!
PC Japanese (JP): 「この期に及んで不埒な話をする余裕があるとは…！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「この期に及んで不埒な話をする余裕があるとは…！」
Russian (RU): "Это надо же, ты всё ещё настолько расслаблен, чтобы нести подобную чушь в такой ситуации!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E pensar que você ainda está relaxado o suficiente para falar tal vulgaridade em uma hora como esta...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都到這副田地了，竟還有口吐不知廉恥之言的從容…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「都到这副田地了，竟还有口吐不知廉耻之言的从容…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E pensare che sei ancora abbastanza rilassato da parlare con una tale insolenza in un momento come questo...!

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): {f:5:Beatrice}-sama, thank you for this excellent prey! Die!!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "{f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, thank you for such good prey! Die!!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beatrice-sama, thank you for such good prey! Die!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 良き獲物っ、ベアトリーチェさま、感謝します！　死ねッ！！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「良き獲物っ、ベアトリーチェさま、感謝します！　死ねッ！！！」
Russian (RU): "{f:5:Беатриче}‐сама, благодарю вас за столь отменную добычу! Умри!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "{f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, obrigada por essa boa presa! Morra!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「好棒的獵物，貝阿朵莉切夫人，謝謝！死吧！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「好棒的猎物，贝阿朵莉切夫人，谢谢！死吧！！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beatrice-sama, grazie per un'ottima preda del genere! Muori!!!"

Steam (ST): Rudolf shot first.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf fired first.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 先制射撃は留弗夫。
Russian (RU): Рудольф выстрелил первым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rudolf disparou primeiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 進行先制射擊的是留弗夫。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 进行先制射击的是留弗夫。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rudolf sparò per primo.

Steam (ST): But even before that bullet could hit her, Belphegor had already moved behind Rudolf's back.
Umineko Project (UP): But even before that bullet could hit her, Belphegor had already moved behind Rudolf's back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But even before that bullet could hit her, Belphegor had already moved behind Rudolf's back.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、その銃弾が着弾するより、ベルフェゴールが留弗夫の背後を取る方が早い。
Russian (RU): Но прежде чем пуля успела достичь её, Вельфегор уже переместилась за спину Рудольфа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas, mesmo antes que aquela bala pudesse atingi‐la, Belphegor já tinha se movido atrás das costas de Rudolf.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，比起子彈命中目標，貝露菲格露繞到留弗夫背後的身法要更快。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，比起子弹命中目标，贝露菲格露绕到留弗夫背后的身法要更快。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma prima che il proiettile potesse colpirla, Belphegor si era già spostata dietro la schiena di Rudolf.

Steam (ST): She then raised a purple curve springing out from her arm...
Umineko Project (UP): There she stood, her arm raised above her, a purple trail extending from it...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She then raised a purple locus springing out from her arm...
PC Japanese (JP): そこには腕より伸びる紫色の奇跡を振り上げる姿が。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そこには腕より伸びる紫色の軌跡を振り上げる姿が。
Russian (RU): Затем она подняла фиолетовый локус, возникший из её руки...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ali ela ficou, com seu braço levantado acima dela, e uma trilha roxa se estendendo dele...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她舉起了手，從手臂上延伸出了紫色的軌跡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她举起了手，从手臂上延伸出了紫色的轨迹。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi lei sollevò un locus viola che le spuntava dal braccio...

Steam (ST): However, incredibly, before that arm could decapitate Rudolf, he had swung his gun behind him.
Umineko Project (UP): However, even before that arm could decapitate Rudolf, unbelievably, Rudolf had swung his gun behind him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, even before that arm could decapitate Rudolf, unbelievably, Rudolf had swung his gun behind him.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、その腕が留弗夫の首を撥ねるより、信じられないことに、留弗夫が背後に銃を振る方が早い。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、その腕が留弗夫の首を刎ねるより、信じられないことに、留弗夫が背後に銃を振る方が早い。
Russian (RU): Однако не успела она опустить руку, чтобы зарубить Рудольфа, тот совершил невероятное действие, выставив ружьё себе за спину.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, antes mesmo que aquele braço pudesse decapitar Rudolf, inacreditavelmente, Rudolf tinha balançado sua arma atrás dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，難以置信的是，比起這只手取下留弗夫的首級，留弗夫將槍對準背後要來得更快。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，难以置信的是，比起这只手取下留弗夫的首级，留弗夫将枪对准背后要来得更快。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, prima che quel braccio potesse decapitare Rudolf, incredibilmente quest'ultimo aveva girato il fucile dietro di lui.

Steam (ST): The barrel remained pointing behind his back...from the same motion with which he had reloaded the sawed-off gun one-handedly.
Umineko Project (UP): The barrel pointed behind his back, from the same motion with which he had reloaded the sawed‐off gun one‐handedly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The barrel remained pointing behind his back, from the same motion with which he had reloaded the sawed-off gun one-handedly.
PC Japanese (JP): ソードオフ銃を片手でリロードするアクションからそのまま、銃口が背後へ伸びていた。
Russian (RU): Дуло было направлено им за спину тем же движением, которым он одной рукой перезарядил обрез.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O cano apontava para suas costas, do mesmo movimento com o qual ele tinha recarregado com uma mão a arma serrada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他單手完成鋸斷式來福槍的上膛動作後，直接將槍口伸向了背後。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他单手完成锯断式来复枪的上膛动作后，直接将枪口伸向了背后。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La canna rimase puntata alle sue spalle, con lo stesso movimento con cui lui aveva ricaricato con una sola mano il fucile a canne mozze.

Steam (ST): It was pointing right at Belphegor's chest...
Umineko Project (UP): It was pointing right at Belphegor's chest...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was pointing right at Belphegor's chest...
PC Japanese (JP): それはぴったりとベルフェゴールの胸元に突きつけられている…。
Russian (RU): И нацелено оно было в грудь Вельфегора...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele estava apontando direto para o peito de Belphegor...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而它正好對準了貝露菲格露的胸口…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而它正好对准了贝露菲格露的胸口…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Stava puntando dritto al petto di Belphegor...

Steam (ST): *click*, *cha-clunk*...! It was the sound of the ejected empty cartridge finally hitting the wall after the reload.
Umineko Project (UP): Takk, clunk‐rrrr...! It was the sound of the ejected empty cartridge finally hitting the wall after the reload.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): *click*, *cha-clunk*...! It was the sound of the ejected empty cartridge finally hitting the wall after the reload.
PC Japanese (JP): チン、カランコロン…！それはリロードで排莢された空薬莢が今更壁を叩く音だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): チン、カランコロン…！　それはリロードで排莢された空薬莢が今更壁を叩く音だった。
Russian (RU): *щёлк*, *щёлк‐лязг*! Это был звук выброшенной пустой гильзы, ударившийся о стену после перезарядки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Takk, clunk‐rrrr...! Era o som do cartucho vazio ejetado finalmente atingindo a parede depois do recarregamento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 啨，喀啷咜嚨…！這是重新裝彈時排出的空彈殻，事到如今才撞到牆壁上的聲音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 啨，喀啷咜咙…！这是重新装弹时排出的空弹壳，事到如今才撞到墙壁上的声音。

Steam (ST): In other words, it meant that the next shot was already fully loaded.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf

Umineko Project (UP): "What an idiot you are. You should have just escaped with your husband. You do know that that was your final farewell just now, right...? *giggle*giggle*giggle*!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você é mesmo idiota. Deveria ter simplesmente escapado com seu marido. Você sabe que aquele adeus agora há pouco foi seu último, certo...? *risos*risos*risos*!"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Che idiota. Potevi semplicemente scappare con tuo marito. Lo sai che quello è stato il tuo ultimo addio, vero...? *giggle*giggle*giggle*!"

Steam (ST): "Heheheheheheheh! What a happy couple. I'm jealous. ......I am Leviathan of Envy...! Envy itself is my power. My anger, my lifeblood!"

Russian (RU): "Хе‐хе‐хе‐хе‐хе‐хе‐хе! Какая счастливая пара. Мне даже завидно. .........Я Левиафан, она же зависть! Сама зависть является моей силой. Моим гневом, моим истоком!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Heheheheheheheh! Vocês são mesmo um casal feliz. Eu os invejo.{n}.........Eu sou Leviathan, da Inveja...! A inveja é, em si mesma, meu poder.{n}Minha raiva, minha origem!"

Steam (ST): ...Even though the magic blade should have cut through the metal like butter, the "gun", with its extremely high magic resistance power, was able to block the blade as easily as if it were a rolled up newspaper.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Even though the magic blade should have been able to cut through metal like butter, the {i:gun}, with its extremely high magic resistance, was able to block the blade as easily as if it were a rolled up newspaper.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isto pode ser meio divertido da sua própria forma. Rudolf, deixe‐me assistir vagarosamente e ver quanto tempo seus bravos esforços perduram. *gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這倒或許也挺有趣的呢。留弗夫，你的奮鬥能持續到幾時，就由我慢慢欣賞個夠。呵、呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵！」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Forse questo può essere divertente. Rudolf, fammi godere senza fretta quanto durano i tuoi coraggiosi sforzi. *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle* *cackle*cackle*!"

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……所以，對於有這麼一個伙伴，並能對他寄予百分百信任的你，我感到了無上的嫉妒…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……所以，对于有这么一个伙伴，并能对他寄予百分百信任的你，我感到了无上的嫉妒…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi, dato che tu hai quel singolo compagno completamente degno di fiducia, io provo la più forte invidia...

Speaker: Leviathan
Steam (ST): "......Aaah, that confident expression of utter belief in your husband...! I can feel it giving me power...!! ......I might even surpass that. The speed of sound!!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "............Aaah, that composed expression of total belief in your husband...! I can feel my envy giving me power...!! .........I might even exceed it. The speed of sound!!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ............Aaah, that expression that fully believes in your husband...! I can feel it giving me power...!! .........I might even surpass that. The speed of sound!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): …………あぁ、その夫を信じきった余裕ある表情…！　嫉妬が力を与えてくれるのを感じるわ…！！　………これは超えちゃうかもね。音速ッ！！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………あぁ、その夫を信じきった余裕ある表情…！　嫉妬が力を与えてくれるのを感じるわ…！！　………これは超えちゃうかもね。音速ッ！！！」
Russian (RU): "............А‐ах, это выражение лица, говорящее о непоколебимом доверии к твоему мужу!.. Я ощущаю, как оно наделяет меня силой! .........Так я даже могу даже кое‐что превзойти. Скорость звука!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Aaah, essa expressão serena de crença total em seu marido...! Consigo sentir minha inveja me dando poder...!! .........Posso até excedê‐la. A velocidade do som!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………啊啊，瞧這完全信任丈夫，有恃無恐的表情…！我感受到了，嫉妒正給予我力量！！………這下說不定能超越呢。超越音速！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………啊啊，瞧这完全信任丈夫，有恃无恐的表情…！我感受到了，嫉妒正给予我力量！！………这下说不定能超越呢。超越音速！！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Aaah, quell'espressione che crede ciecamente in tuo marito...! Posso sentire che mi dona potere...!! Potrei perfino superarla. La velocità del suono!!!"

Steam (ST): Leviathan turned herself into a stake, and the speed of her flight as she attacked was proportional to the strength of her envy.
Umineko Project (UP): Leviathan turned herself into a stake, and the speed of her flight as she attacked was proportional to the strength of her envy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): レヴィアタンが杭に姿を変え、襲い掛かる時の飛翔速度は、その嫉妬の力に比例する。
Russian (RU): Левиафан превратилась в кинжал, и скорость, с которой она нападала, была прямо пропорциональна силе её зависти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Leviathan transformou‐se em uma estaca, e a velocidade de seu voo enquanto ela atacava era proporcional à força de sua inveja.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雷維阿坦化為了樁的形態，其攻擊時的飛行速度，是與她的嫉妒之力成正比的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雷维阿坦化为了桩的形态，其攻击时的飞行速度，是与她的嫉妒之力成正比的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Leviathan si trasformò in un pugnale, e la velocità del suo volo mentre attaccava era proporzionale alla forza della sua invidia.

Speaker: Leviathan
Steam (ST): "Since the day my sisters looked down on me, I was jealous from the bottom of my heart of the other six, who grew quickly! I was jealous for seven days and seven nights!! You can see the power I gained as a result in my speed...!! Die, Ushiromiya Kyrieeeeeeeeeeee!!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "On that day when my sisters looked down on me, I was jealous from the bottom of my heart of the other six, who had grown quickly! I was jealous for seven days and seven nights!! Behold the power and speed I ultimately gained...!! Die, Ushiromiya Kyrieee{-}e{-}e{-}e{-}e{-}e{-}eeee!!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Since the day that my sisters looked down on me. I was jealous from the bottom of my heart of the other six, who grew quickly! I was jealous for seven days and seven nights!! You can see the power I gained as a result from my speed...!! Die, Ushiromiya Kyrieeeeeeeeeeee!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「姉妹たちに見下されたあの日。私は成長の早い他の６人を心の底から嫉妬した！　七日七晩をかけて嫉妬したわ！！　その末に得た私の力と速度を見るがいい…！！　死ねッ、右代宮霧江ええええぇッ！！！」
Russian (RU): "С того самого дня, как мои сёстры принижали меня, я от всей души завидовала их быстрому росту! Я завидовала им семь дней и ночей! Узри мою силу, полученную благодаря моей скорости! Умри, Уширомия Кирие‐е‐е‐е‐е!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Naquele dia, quando minhas irmãs me menosprezaram, eu fiquei com inveja, do fundo do meu coração, das outras seis, que tinham crescido mais rápido! Fiquei com inveja por sete dias e sete noites!! Contemple o poder e a velocidade que ganhei com isso...!! Morra, Ushiromiya Kyrieee{‐}e{‐}e{‐}e{‐}e{‐}e{‐}eeee!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「在被姐妹們蔑視的那一天。我從心底裏嫉妒，成長快的她們六人！嫉妒了七天七夜！！好好瞧瞧，我通過此得到的力量與速度…！！死吧，右代宮霧江——————！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「在被姐妹们蔑视的那一天。我从心底里嫉妒，成长快的她们六人！嫉妒了七天七夜！！好好瞧瞧，我通过此得到的力量与速度…！！死吧，右代宫雾江——————！！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sin dal giorno in cui le mie sorelle mi guardarono dall'alto in basso. Fui gelosa dal profondo del cuore delle altre sei, che crescevano velocemente! Fui gelosa per sette giorni e sette notti!! Puoi capire dalla mia velocità il potere che ne è risultato...!! Muori, Ushiromiya Kyrieeeeeeeeeeee!!!"

Steam (ST): The demon stake exposed her true form, leaping about at a terrible speed. The noise from her bouncing off the walls sounded like a machine gun.
Umineko Project (UP): The demon stake exposed her true form, leaping about at a terrible speed. The noise from her colliding with and bouncing off the walls sounded like a machine gun.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The demon stake exposed her true form, leaping about at a terrible speed. The noise from her bouncing off the walls sounded like a machine gun.
PC Japanese (JP): 悪魔の杭がその本来の姿を晒し、凄まじい速度にて跳ね回る。壁を打ち反射する音はまるで機関銃の音にも聞こえた。
Russian (RU): Демонический кинжал явил свой истинный облик, метнувшись с невероятной скоростью. Шум её отскакиваний от стен напоминал пулемётные звуки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A estaca demoníaca expôs sua verdadeira forma, saltando em volta a uma velocidade terrível. O barulho dela colidindo e ricocheteando nas paredes soava como uma metralhadora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 惡魔之樁暴露出其本來面目，以駭人的速度亂彈亂飛。在牆壁上彈來彈去所發出的聲音，聽起來簡直就像是機關槍的聲音一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 恶魔之桩暴露出其本来面目，以骇人的速度乱弹乱飞。在墙壁上弹来弹去所发出的声音，听起来简直就像是机关枪的声音一样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il pugnale demoniaco si rivelò nella sua vera forma, muovendosi ad una terribile velocità. Il suo rumore mentre rimbalzava sulle pareti sembrava quello di una mitragliatrice.

Steam (ST): By now, Kyrie probably couldn't tell if it was a single stake or a swarm of beetles flying and bouncing around.
Umineko Project (UP): By now, Kyrie probably couldn't tell whether it was a single stake or a swarm of beetles flying and bouncing around.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By now, Kyrie probably couldn't tell whether it was a single stake or a swarm of beetles flying and bouncing around.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江の目にはもはや、それが１本の杭なのか、群れ飛び弾け回る甲虫の群なのか、識別が付かないだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江の目にはもはや、それが１本の杭なのか、群れ飛び弾け回る甲虫の群れなのか、識別が付かないだろう。
Russian (RU): Сейчас Кирие вряд ли бы смогла с уверенностью сказать, был ли это летающий и отскакивающий отовсюду один кинжал или рой жуков.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora, Kyrie provavelmente não conseguia dizer se era uma única estaca ou uma nuvem de besouros voando e ricocheteando ao redor.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江的眼睛已无法识别出，那是一根桩，还是一大群乱飞乱弹的甲虫了吧。

Umineko Project (UP): Leviathan was certain of a greater than 100% chance of victory, from the bottom of her heart...!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Leviathan was certain of a greater than 100% chance of victory from the bottom of her heart...!

Russian (RU): Левиафан глубоко, на все 100% была убеждена в своей грядущей победе!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Leviathan estava certa de uma chance de vitória maior que 100%, do fundo de seu coração...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雷維阿坦從心底確信了，那概率超過 100% 的絕對勝利…！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雷维阿坦从心底确信了，那概率超过 100% 的绝对胜利…！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Leviathan era sicura di una percentuale di vittoria maggiore del 100% dal profondo del suo cuore...!

Steam (ST): Then, Kyrie spoke with an unbelievably calm voice.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, Kyrie spoke with an unbelievably calm voice.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "......I was the one who went out with Rudolf-san first. ...Asumu-san blatantly cut in between us... and shrewdly got pregnant."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........I was the one who had been going out with Rudolf‐san from the very beginning. ......Asumu‐san shamelessly cut in between us, ...and calculatingly got herself pregnant."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........I was the one who had been going out with Rudolf-san from the very beginning. ......Asumu-san blatantly cut in between us, ...and shrewdly got pregnant.
PC Japanese (JP): 「………留弗夫さんと、最初から付き合っていたのは私だったのよ。……明日夢さんが、白々しく間に入り込んできて、…ちゃっかりと懐妊したのよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………留弗夫さんと、最初から付き合っていたのは私だったのよ。……明日夢さんが、白々しく間に入り込んできて、…ちゃっかりと懐妊したのよ」
Russian (RU): ".........Я была той, кто встречался с Рудольфом с самого начала. ......Асуму‐сан нагло влезла между нами... и бесстыже забеременела."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Era eu quem estava saindo com Rudolf‐san desde o início.{n}......A Asumu‐san descaradamente se meteu entre nós, ...e calculadamente ficou grávida."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………從一開始就在與留弗夫交往的，是我喲。……明日夢厚顏無恥地插足，…看準機會懷了孕。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………从一开始就在与留弗夫交往的，是我哟。……明日梦厚颜无耻地插足，…看准机会怀了孕。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ero io quella che stava uscendo sin dall'inizio con Rudolf-san. ... Asumu-san si intromise sfacciatamente... e rimase astutamente incinta.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "...I don't blame Rudolf-san. That woman used her body as a weapon to seduce him, and then acted even more repulsively, cornering Rudolf-san and forcing him to get engaged to her."
Umineko Project (UP): "......I don't blame Rudolf‐san. That woman manipulated him using her body as a weapon, and cornered him into a situation where he was forced to become engaged to her."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I don't blame Rudolf-san. That woman used her body as a weapon to seduce him, and then acted even more repulsively, and cornered Rudolf-san so that he was forced to engage her."
PC Japanese (JP): ……留弗夫さんは悪くないわ。あの女が、体を武器にして誑し込んで、さらに嫌らしく立ち回って、留弗夫さんに婚約せざるを得ないよう追い詰めたのよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……留弗夫さんは悪くないわ。あの女が、体を武器にして立ち回って、留弗夫さんに婚約せざるを得ないよう追い詰めたのよ」
Russian (RU): "......Я не виню Рудольфа‐сана. Эта женщина воспользовалась своим телом как оружием для его соблазнения, а затем повела себя ещё отвратительней и загнала Рудольфа‐сана в угол, из‐за чего он был вынужден жениться на ней."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Não culpo o Rudolf‐san. Aquela mulher o manipulou usando seu corpo como uma arma, o encurralou em uma situação onde ele foi forçado a se tornar o noivo dela."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……不是留弗夫的錯。是那個女人，以身體為武器勾引，陰險周旋，逼得留弗夫不得不與她訂婚。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……不是留弗夫的错。是那个女人，以身体为武器勾引，阴险周旋，逼得留弗夫不得不与她订婚。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non incolpo Rudolf-san. Quella donna usò il suo corpo come arma per sedurlo, e poi lei agì in modo perfino più rivoltante, e mise Rudolf-san con le spalle al muro così che fosse costretto a fidanzarsi con lei."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): Asumu-san had been carrying Battler-kun. {n}And at the same time, I was also carrying a boy. {n}...As fate would have it, our delivery dates were on the same day.
Umineko Project (UP): Asumu‐san was carrying Battler‐kun.{n}And at the same time, I was also carrying a boy.{n}...As fate would have it, our delivery dates were on the same day.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Asumu-san had been carrying Battler-kun.{n} And at the same time, I was also carrying a boy.{n}...As fate would have it, our delivery dates were on the same day.
PC Japanese (JP): 明日夢さんは戦人くんを身篭ってたわ。{n}そして同じ頃、私もまた男の子を身篭ってた。{n}…運命的なことに、私たちの出産日は共に同じ日だったわ。
Russian (RU): Асуму‐сан носила под сердцем Баттлера.{n}В то же время я также была беременна мальчиком.{n}...По прихоти судьбы, мы рожали в один день.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Asumu‐san estava carregando o Battler‐kun.{n}Ao mesmo tempo, eu também estava carregando um menino.{n}...Como quis o destino, nossas datas de parto foram no mesmo dia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 明日夢懷上了戰人君。{n}同時，我也懷上了一個男孩。{n}…猶如宿命一般，我們的出產日為同一天。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 明日梦怀上了战人君。{n}同时，我也怀上了一个男孩。{n}…犹如宿命一般，我们的出产日为同一天。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Asumu-san portava in grembo Battler-kun. {n}E nello stesso periodo, anche io aspettavo un bambino maschio. {n}... Come se l'avesse voluto il destino, anche la data del parto fu la stessa.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Then, Asumu-san gave birth to Battler-kun. ...But I had a miscarriage. ......I think about it, sometimes. What if Asumu-san had had the miscarriage...and I had been the one to give birth?
Umineko Project (UP): "And Asumu‐san gave birth to Battler‐kun. ...But I was not so lucky. .........There's something I've thought about. What if Asumu‐san had been the unlucky one, and I had been the one to give birth?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Then, Asumu-san gave birth to Battler-kun. ...But I had a miscarriage. .........There's something I've thought about. What if Asumu-san had been the one to have a miscarriage, and I had been the one to give birth?
PC Japanese (JP): 「そして明日夢さんは戦人くんを出産したわ。…だけれど私は流産したの。………思ったことがあるわ。もし流産したのが明日夢さんで、出産したのが私だったなら。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そして明日夢さんは戦人くんを出産したわ。…だけれど私はダメだった。………思ったことがあるわ。もしダメだったのが明日夢さんで、出産したのが私だったなら」
Russian (RU): "Асуму‐сан родила Баттлера. ...А у меня случился выкидыш. .........И вот о чём я думала. А что если бы у Асуму‐сан случился выкидыш, тогда как я родила живого ребёнка?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E a Asumu‐san deu à luz ao Battler‐kun. ...Mas eu não tive a mesma sorte. .........Eu fiquei pensando sobre aquilo. E se a Asumu‐san tivesse sido a azarada, e eu tivesse sido aquela a dar à luz?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「然後，明日夢生下了戰人君。…而我卻流產了。………我曾想過。如果流產的是明日夢，生下小孩的是我的話。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「然后，明日梦生下了战人君。…而我却流产了。………我曾想过。如果流产的是明日梦，生下小孩的是我的话。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Poi, Asumu-san fece nascere Battler-kun. ... Ma io ebbi un aborto spontaneo. ... È qualcosa a cui ho pensato. Che sarebbe successo se fosse stata Asumu-san quella ad avere l'aborto, e io quella a far nascere il bambino?

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): ...Would Rudolf-san have broken off his engagement and married me? ...But I couldn't give birth to my child. So until Asumu-san died, and until I got pregnant with Ange, I cursed Asumu-san and was jealous."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Would Rudolf‐san have broken off his engagement and married me? ......But I couldn't birth a child. So until Asumu‐san died, and until I got pregnant with Ange, I cursed Asumu‐san, and was jealous of her."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Would Rudolf-san have broken off his engagement and married me? ......But I couldn't give birth to a child. So until Asumu-san died, and until I got pregnant with Ange, I cursed Asumu-san, and was jealous of her."
PC Japanese (JP): ……留弗夫さんは婚約を解消して、私と結婚してくれたかしら？　……でも私は子どもを産めなかった。だから明日夢さんが死ぬまで。そして縁寿を懐妊するまで、私は明日夢さんを呪ったわ、嫉妬したわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……留弗夫さんは婚約を解消して、私と結婚してくれたかしら？　……でも私は子どもを産めなかった。だから明日夢さんが死ぬまで。そして縁寿を懐妊するまで、私は明日夢さんを呪ったわ、嫉妬したわ」
Russian (RU): "......Отозвал бы Рудольф‐сан свою помолвку с ней и женился на мне? ......Но я не смогла родить ребёнка. Так что пока Асуму‐сан не умерла, и пока я не забеременела Энджи, я проклинала Асуму‐сан, завидовала ей."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......O Rudolf‐san teria rompido seu noivado e se casado comigo? ......Mas eu não consegui dar à luz a uma criança. Então, até a Asumu‐san morrer, e até eu ficar grávida da Ange, eu a amaldiçoei e tive inveja dela."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……留弗夫是不是會解除婚約，與我結婚呢？……可是我沒能生下小孩。所以在明日夢死去，我懷上緣壽之前，我對明日夢抱以詛咒，還有嫉妒。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……留弗夫是不是会解除婚约，与我结婚呢？……可是我没能生下小孩。所以在明日梦死去，我怀上缘寿之前，我对明日梦抱以诅咒，还有嫉妒。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Rudolf-san avrebbe rotto il suo fidanzamento e mi avrebbe sposata? ... Ma non feci nascere un bambino. Quindi fino a quando Asumu-san non è morta, e fino a quando non sono rimasta incinta di Ange, io maledii Asumu-san, e fui invidiosa di lei."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): Let Asumu-san die.
Umineko Project (UP): Asumu‐san should just die.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Asumu-san should just die.
PC Japanese (JP): 明日夢さんなんか死んでしまえ。
Russian (RU): Ей следовало просто сдохнуть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Asumu‐san devia simplesmente morrer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 明日夢快點死掉吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 明日梦快点死掉吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Asumu-san sarebbe solo dovuta morire.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): Then, I want him to marry me. In my envy, I kept cursing like that, over and over, until Asumu-san finally died.
Umineko Project (UP): And then I want him to remarry, with me... In my envy, I kept cursing her like that, over and over, until Asumu‐san finally died.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And then I want him to remarry, with me. In my envy, I kept cursing like that, over and over, until Asumu-san finally died.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim ele vai se casar de novo, comigo... Em minha inveja, continuei amaldiçoando‐a assim, de novo e de novo, até a Asumu‐san finalmente morrer.

Steam (ST): I was certain.
Umineko Project (UP): I became certain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was certain.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我確信了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我确信了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ne ero certa.

Umineko Project (UP): I became certain that I possessed the power of magic, and that it had become a curse which had killed Asumu‐san.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was certain that I had possessed the power of magic, which had become a curse and killed Asumu-san.
PC Japanese (JP): 私には魔法の力があって、それが呪いとなって明日夢さんを殺したんだって確信したわ。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): But that didn't quell the flames of my envy.
Umineko Project (UP): But that did not quell the flames of my envy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But that did not quell the flames of my envy.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): Don't tell anyone, okay?
Umineko Project (UP): Don't tell anyone, alright?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Don't tell anyone, alright?

Chinese Simplified (CN): 要保密哟？

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): Every time I look at Battler-kun, I remember that woman.
Umineko Project (UP): Every time I look at Battler‐kun, I remember that woman.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Every time I look at Battler-kun, I remember that woman.

Russian (RU): Каждый раз, когда я смотрю на Баттлера‐куна, я вспоминаю эту женщину.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Toda vez que olho para o Battler‐kun, me lembro daquela mulher.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): Every single time I look at him, ...I think that if only my child had been born, he would be the same age.
Umineko Project (UP): And every time I look at Battler‐kun, ...I think that if only my child had been born, he would be the same age.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And every time I look at Battler-kun, ...I think that if only my child had been born, he would be the same age.

Russian (RU): И каждый раз, когда я смотрю на Баттлера‐куна, то не могу отделаться от мысли, что родись мой ребёнок живым, он сейчас был бы его ровесником.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E toda vez que olho para o Battler‐kun, ...penso que se meu filho tivesse nascido, ele seria da mesma idade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且，在看到戰人君時。…我就會想到，如果我的孩子降生到了世上的話，也有這麼大了吧。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie

Umineko Project (UP): I am still jealous of her, tormented by her.{n}Now, and forever. For all eternity.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda tenho inveja dela, sou atormentada por ela.{n}Agora, e para sempre. Por toda a eternidade.

Steam (ST): ...They say a human's walking speed is 4 km/h, so it was even less than half of that. This is almost the same speed as a baby crawling on the floor.

PC Japanese (JP): 宙を舞う埃の数を、完全に数え切れるくらいに鈍りきった鈍足の単位時間の中で、霧江は憐れむように悪魔の杭を見る。

Steam (ST): As she pointed the barrel of her gun straight at the witch, she ran up to the wound-covered Rudolf.

Umineko Project (UP): ".........Well, it's only natural that it'd be impossible for the Predecessor's worn out furniture. ......I have to have new furniture, suitable for me. I used them out of obligation, ......but I've always hated hand‐me‐downs."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………そりゃあ、先代さまの使い古しの家具じゃ無理で当然ね。……私には私に相応しい、新しい家具じゃないと駄目よ。私、義理で使ったけど。……元々、お古は嫌いなの」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「停止古怪的举动…！不然就扣下扳机了…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Smettila...! Premerò il grilletto..."

Steam (ST): In response to the witch's call, the hall was once again buried with the color of gold.
Umineko Project (UP): In response to the witch's call, the hall was once again buried in the color of gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In response to the witch's call, the hall was once again buried with the color of gold.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女の呼びかけに応じ、再びホールが金色で埋め尽くされる。
Russian (RU): В ответ на зов ведьмы, холл утонул в золотом цвете.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em resposta ao chamado da bruxa, o hall foi mais uma vez enterrado na cor dourada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 呼應魔女的召喚，金光再度注滿了門廳。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 呼应魔女的召唤，金光再度注满了门厅。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In risposta alla chiamata della strega, l'atrio venne ancora una volta riempito con il colore dell'oro.

Steam (ST): As the brilliantly radiant gold butterflies danced, ...it felt as though they were being sucked into an ocean of gold leaf.
Umineko Project (UP): It was a wild dance of brilliantly radiant gold butterflies, ...and felt as though they had been swallowed up by an ocean of gold leaf.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the brilliantly radiant gold butterflies danced, ...it felt as though they were being sucked into an ocean of gold leaf.
PC Japanese (JP): それはあまりにも眩しい黄金蝶たちの乱舞で、…まるで金箔の海に飲み込まれたようにさえ感じた。
Russian (RU): Танец ослепительно сверкающих бабочек, казалось, засасывал их в океан золотой листвы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era uma dança selvagem de borboletas douradas irradiando brilho, ...e parecia como se eles tivessem sido engolidos por um oceano de folhas douradas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那狂舞的黃金蝶群過於光彩奪目，…甚至令人感覺，自己在被金箔的海洋吞沒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那狂舞的黄金蝶群过于光彩夺目，…甚至令人感觉，自己在被金箔的海洋吞没。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre brillanti farfalle dorate danzarono brillantemente... sembrava che fossero risucchiati in un oceano di foglie dorate.

Steam (ST): Ronove was shocked at that upsurge in magical power... After all, it far surpassed that of his former master.
Umineko Project (UP): Ronove was left shocked at that upsurge in magic power...{n}That was because it far surpassed even that of his former master.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Ronove was shocked at that upsurge in magic power... That was because it far surpassed that of his former master.
PC Japanese (JP): その魔力の高まりに、ロノウェは呆然とする…。それはかつての主さえも遥かに超えるからだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その魔力の高まりに、ロノウェは呆然とする…。{n}それはかつての主さえも遥かに超えるからだ。
Russian (RU): Ронове был поражен этим всплеском магической силы...{n}Поскольку она во много раз превосходила силу его бывшей госпожи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ronove ficou chocado diante desse aumento de poder mágico...{n}Isso porque tal poder ultrapassava de longe até mesmo o da sua antiga mestra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 面對這高漲的魔力，羅諾威不禁目瞪口呆…。{n}這是因為，這遠遠超越了他曾經的主人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 面对这高涨的魔力，罗诺威不禁目瞪口呆…。{n}这是因为，这远远超越了他曾经的主人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ronove era impressionato da quell'incremento di potere magico... questo perché superava di gran lunga la sua precedente padrona.

Steam (ST): As their eyes were dazzled amidst this golden flash, a gunshot could be heard. Either Rudolf or Kyrie had fired a round.
Umineko Project (UP): As their eyes were dazzled amidst the golden brilliance, a gunshot could be heard.{n}Either Rudolf or Kyrie had fired a round.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As their eyes were dazzled amidst the golden flash, a gunshot could be heard. Either Rudolf or Kyrie had fired a round.
PC Japanese (JP): その目も眩む黄金の輝きの中、銃声が聞こえた。留弗夫か霧江のどちらかが発砲したのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その目も眩む黄金の輝きの中、銃声が聞こえた。{n}留弗夫か霧江のどちらかが発砲したのだ。
Russian (RU): Когда их глаза оказались ослеплены золотой вспышкой, раздался выстрел.{n}Либо Кирие, либо Рудольф пустили пулю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto seus olhos estavam ofuscados em meio ao brilho dourado, um tiro pôde ser ouvido.{n}Rudolf ou Kyrie tinha feito um disparo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在炫目的黃金光輝之中，傳來了槍聲。{n}留弗夫與霧江兩人中的某一人開了槍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在炫目的黄金光辉之中，传来了枪声。{n}留弗夫与雾江两人中的某一人开了枪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando i loro occhi furono abbagliati da un bagliore dorato, si poté sentire uno sparo. O Kyrie o Rudolf aveva sparato un proiettile.

Steam (ST): ...Then, when the golden flash subsided, at the very least the witch was standing there, looking cool and composed.
Umineko Project (UP): ......And after the golden glow had subsided, there was the witch, looking at least cool and composed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Then, after the golden flash had subsided, the witch, who was at least cool and composed, could be seen.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そして、その黄金の輝きが収まった後には、少なくとも平然とした魔女の姿があった。
Russian (RU): Затем, когда золотая вспышка погасла, стала видна ведьма, которая хотя бы была спокойна и собрана.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......E depois que o brilho dourado baixou, ali estava a bruxa, parecendo, no mínimo, calma e serena.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……接著，在這黃金光芒收斂之後，現出了泰然自若的魔女的身姿。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……接着，在这黄金光芒收敛之后，现出了泰然自若的魔女的身姿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi, dopo che cessò il bagliore dorato, la strega, che era fredda e composta, poteva essere vista.

Steam (ST): The bullet? Kyrie must have fired it into her.
Umineko Project (UP): The bullet? Kyrie had definitely fired it into her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The bullet? Hadn't Kyrie fired it into her?
PC Japanese (JP): 弾は？　霧江は確かに撃ち込んだはず。
Russian (RU): А пуля? Разве Кирие не выстрелила в неё?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A bala? Kyrie definitivamente tinha disparado nela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 子彈呢？霧江的確是射出了子彈。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 子弹呢？雾江的确是射出了子弹。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il proiettile? Kyrie non l'aveva sparato?

Steam (ST): But the witch had not been hit anywhere on her body.
Umineko Project (UP): But it was not embedded anywhere in the witch's body.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But the witch had not been hit anywhere on her body.
PC Japanese (JP): しかしそれは魔女の体のどこにも撃ち込まれてはいない。
Russian (RU): Но у ведьмы на теле не было видно каких‐либо ран.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas ela não havia atingido em lugar nenhum no corpo da bruxa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，它並沒有命中魔女的身體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，它并没有命中魔女的身体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma la strega non era stata colpita da nessuna parte.

Steam (ST): There it is. ...The bullet had been fastened in midair right in front of the witch's chest.
Umineko Project (UP): There it was. ...The bullet was fastened in midair right in front of the witch's chest.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There it is. ...The bullet had been fastened in midair right in front of the witch's chest.
PC Japanese (JP): あった。…弾は魔女の胸の直前で虚空に縫い止められていた。
Russian (RU): Вот она. ...Пуля зависла в воздухе прямо перед грудью у ведьмы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ali estava. ...A bala estava presa no ar, bem em frente ao peito da bruxa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在那裡。…子彈被定在了魔女胸前，只差毫釐的半空中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在那里。…子弹被定在了魔女胸前，只差毫厘的半空中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eccolo. ... Era stato fermato a mezz'aria proprio davanti al petto della strega.

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): "...A-A bullet-proof barrier......!"
Umineko Project (UP): "A, ......a bullet‐proof barrier........."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "A, ......a bullet-proof barrier........."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ぼ、……防弾結界ッ………。」
Russian (RU): "П...противопульный барьер..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uma ......Uma barreira à prova de balas........."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "U... Una barriera a prova di proiettili..."

Steam (ST): In an instant, a barrier that would require a significant amount of preparation even for the Predecessor had been... Ronove's face was twisted in shock. And, the surprises did not end there...
Umineko Project (UP): A barrier which took even her predecessor a significant amount of preparation...in an instant...{n}Ronove's face was by now twisted in shock.{n}And the surprise did not stop there......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A barrier which took even the predecessor a significant amount of preparation had, in an instant... Ronove's face was still twisted in shock. And, the surprise did not stop there......
PC Japanese (JP): 先代ですら充分な準備を必要とした結界を、瞬時に…。ロノウェの顔は今や驚愕に歪む。そして、その驚きはそれだけに留まらない……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 先代ですら充分な準備を必要とした結界を、瞬時に…。{n}ロノウェの顔は今や驚愕に歪む。{n}そして、その驚きはそれだけに止まらない……。
Russian (RU): Барьер, требовавший даже у предшественницы много времени для подготовки, оказался воздвигнут в одно мгновение...{n}На лице у Ронове так и застыла гримаса удивления.{n}И на этом сюрпризы не закончились......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma barreira que tomaria até da predecessora uma quantia significativa de preparação... em um instante...{n}O rosto de Ronove estava agora contorcido em uma expressão de surpresa.{n}E a surpresa não parou aí......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 連先代都要做足準備才能布下的結界，竟在一瞬間就…。{n}羅諾威的臉，此刻因驚愕而扭曲。{n}而且，這份驚異並未就此止步……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 连先代都要做足准备才能布下的结界，竟在一瞬间就…。{n}罗诺威的脸，此刻因惊愕而扭曲。{n}而且，这份惊异并未就此止步……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Una barriera che persino all'onorevole Predecessora faceva impiegare un non indifferente lasso di tempo era stata, in un istante... la faccia di Ronove era ancora contorta nello stupore. E, la sorpresa non finiva là...

Steam (ST): The cloud of gold butterflies had created two humanoid forms.
Umineko Project (UP): The group of gold butterflies created two humanoid forms.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The group of gold butterflies had created two humanoid forms.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金の蝶たちの群が、２つの人型を生み出す。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 黄金の蝶たちの群れが、２つの人型を生み出す。
Russian (RU): Группа золотых бабочек создала две человекообразные формы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O grupo de borboletas douradas criou duas formas humanoides.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金蝶群聚成了兩個人形。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金蝶群聚成了两个人形。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il gruppo di farfalle dorate aveva creato due forme umanoidi.

Steam (ST): ...It was a furniture summoning.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was a furniture summoning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……それは家具の召喚。
Russian (RU): ......Это был призыв мебели.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Era uma invocação de mobília.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這即是，召喚家具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这即是，召唤家具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era un'evocazione di mobili.

Steam (ST): The butterflies peeled off and flew away, and beneath them, furniture in the shape of girls showed themselves.
Umineko Project (UP): The butterflies peeled off and flew away, and beneath them, furniture in the shape of girls showed themselves.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The butterflies peeled off and flew away, and beneath them, furniture in the shape of girls showed themselves.
PC Japanese (JP): 蝶たちが剥がれ飛び、その下より、少女たちを模した家具が姿を現す。
Russian (RU): Бабочки оторвались и улетели, а тем, что было под ними, оказалась мебель в форме девушек.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As borboletas descascaram e voaram para longe; debaixo delas, mobílias na forma de garotas apareceram.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 蝶群自行剝離，從它們之下，模仿少女的家具的身形出現了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 蝶群自行剥离，从它们之下，模仿少女的家具的身形出现了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le farfalle si dispersero e volarono via, e sotto di loro, si mostrarono dei mobili dalla forma di ragazze.

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): ".........The Chiester Sisters Corps... ......Even the Predecessor... ...wasn't able to summon Pendragon's Memorial Troops on a moment's notice, and to do it so easily...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "..................The Chiester Sisters troops... .........Even the Predecessor......wasn't able to summon the Pendragon's Memorial Troops on a moment's notice, and so easily...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...............The Siesta Sisters Corps............Even the predecessor, ......wasn't able to summon them on a moment's notice, Pendragon's Memorial Troops, and so easily...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………………シエスタの姉妹兵…。………先代さまでも、……おいそれと呼び出せなかった、ペンドラゴンの記念兵を、いとも容易く…！」
Russian (RU): "...............Корпус сестёр Чиест... .........Даже предшественница... не могла моментально и с такой лёгкостью призвать мемориальный отряд Пендрагона!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "..................A Guarda das Irmãs Chiester...? .........Até mesmo a predecessora......não era capaz de invocar a Tropa Memorial do Rei Pendragon de uma hora para outra, e tão facilmente...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………………謝絲塔姐妹兵…。………連先代夫人，……都無法輕易喚出的，潘德拉貢的紀念兵，竟被如此容易地…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………………谢丝塔姐妹兵…。………连先代夫人，……都无法轻易唤出的，潘德拉贡的纪念兵，竟被如此容易地…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Il Corpo delle Sorelle Chiester... neppure l'onorevole Predecessora... era capace di evocarle istantaneamente, le Truppe Commemorative di Pendragon, e così facilmente...!"

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...You two are suitable furniture for me, I take it?"
Umineko Project (UP): "...You two {i:are} suitable furniture for me, right?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...You two are suitable furniture for me, right?"

Speaker: Chiester410
Steam (ST): "From reading a picture book out aloud, to going on a date, to shooting down meteorites, we'll take care of anything. Nihihi."
Umineko Project (UP): "From reading you a picture book, to going on a friendship date, to shooting down a meteorite, we'll take care of anything. Nihihi."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "From reading a picture book out loud, to going on a date, to shooting down meteorites, we'll take care of anything. Nihihi."
PC Japanese (JP): 「絵本の朗読から同伴デートに隕石撃墜まで、幅広くお応えしますよ。にひひ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「絵本の朗読から同伴デートに隕石撃墜まで、幅広くお応えしますよ。にひひ」
Russian (RU): "От чтения вслух книжки с картинками до отстреливания метеоритов — со всем справимся. Ни‐хи‐хи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Desde ler um livro de gravuras, acompanhar um encontro e atirar em um meteorito, tomaremos conta de tudo. Nihihi."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「從朗讀圖書，陪同約會到擊墜隕石，方面廣泛地為您服務。泥嘻嘻。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「从朗读图书，陪同约会到击坠陨石，方面广泛地为您服务。泥嘻嘻。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Dal leggere un libro illustrato a voce alta, all'andare a un appuntamento, al distruggere meteoriti, ci occuperemo di ogni cosa. Nihihi."

Speaker: Chiester45
Steam (ST): "I-If we don't take care of it, Pendragon-sama will get mad at us...! Please, your orders, Great Lady {f:5:Beatrice}!"
Umineko Project (UP): "I‐if we don't take care of it, the Dragon King will get mad at us...! Please, your orders, Great Lady {f:5:Beatrice}!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I, if we don't take care of it, Pendragon-sama will get mad at us...! Please, your orders, great Lady Beatrice!"

Russian (RU): "Е... если не справимся, то получим нагоняй от Пендрагона‐сама! Прошу, приказывайте, великая Леди {f:5:Беатриче}!"

Steam (ST): Kyrie definitely heard warning sirens going off in her head, thanks to the same feeling that had alerted her to the ambush by the Seven Sisters of Purgatory.
Umineko Project (UP): Thanks to the same feeling that had alerted her to the ambush by the Seven Sisters of Purgatory, Kyrie clearly heard warning sirens going off in her head, almost resembling screams.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie definitely heard warning sirens going off in her head, thanks to the same feeling that had alerted her to the ambush by the Seven Sisters of Purgatory.
PC Japanese (JP): 煉獄の七姉妹の待ち伏せを予見したのと同じ直感が、悲鳴にも似た警鐘を鳴らすのを霧江は確かに聞いた。
Russian (RU): У Кирие возникло то же самое ощущение, что предупредило её о засаде семи сестёр чистилища, и в голове у неё забил набат.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Graças ao mesmo sentimento que tinha alertado‐a para a emboscada das Sete Irmãs do Purgatório, Kyrie claramente ouviu sirenes de aviso soando em sua cabeça, quase lembrando gritos.

Steam (ST): Without hesitation, they escaped.
Umineko Project (UP): Without hesitation, they ran.

Steam (ST): As the witch elegantly watched them leave, she commanded her new furniture.
Umineko Project (UP): As the witch elegantly watched them leave, she ordered her new furniture.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the witch elegantly watched them leave, she ordered her new furniture.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女はその背中を優雅に見送りながら、新しき家具たちに命ずる。
Russian (RU): Элегантно наблюдая их побег, ведьма дала приказ своей новой мебели.

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...This is an order. Kill the two who ran away. Then bring the corpses back here. I'll bring 'em back to life and play with them over and over. ...*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "...This is an order. Kill the two who ran away. Then bring the corpses back here. Then I'll bring them back to life, and play with them over and over. ...*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「…命令よ。逃げた２人を殺して。そして死体をここへ持ち帰りなさい。そしたら生き返らせて、何度も遊ぶのよ。…くっくくくくくくくくく！！」
Russian (RU): "...Внимание. Убейте эту сбежавшую пару. Затем притащите трупы сюда. Тогда я воскрешу их и наиграюсь от души. ...*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Isto é uma ordem. Matem os dois que fugiram. Então tragam seus corpos de volta para cá. Eu os trarei de volta à vida e brincarei com eles de novo e de novo. ...*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…命令。殺掉逃跑的兩人。然後，帶回屍體。復活他們，玩個無數次。…呵、呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…命令。杀掉逃跑的两人。然后，带回尸体。复活他们，玩个无数次。…呵、呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Questo è un ordine. Uccidete i due che sono scappati. Poi portate qua i loro cadaveri. Li resusciterò, e giocherò con loro ancora e ancora. ... *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*!!"

Umineko Project (UP): The witch's expression twisted with an evil smile.

Umineko Project (UP): Even though she feared that expression, Lucifer appeared and spoke.

Speaker: Lucifer

Umineko Project (UP): "M‐...my apologies. ...The Predecessor said to avoid brutal actions of that—"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "M, ...my apologies. ...The Predecessor-sama said to avoid brutal actions of that type..."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「恕、…恕我冒昧。…先代夫人说过，尽量别有此种残酷行为…」

Umineko Project (UP): When the witch stared at her with those terrifying eyes, Lucifer was struck dumb.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女がぎょろりと恐ろしい目で睨みつけると、ルシファーは閉口する。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando a bruxa a encarou com seu olhar aterrorizantes, Lucifer ficou emudecida, sentindo‐se uma idiota.

Steam (ST): ...She was frustrated. It was so boring, not being able to let her own power and cruelty run wild.
Umineko Project (UP): ...She was unsatisfied. She was bored, of not being able to let her own power and her own cruelty run wild.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...It was unsatisfying. It was so boring, not being able to let her own power and her own cruelty run wild.

Russian (RU): ...Она не чувствовала удовлетворения. Ей было скучно из‐за невозможности действовать в полную силу и дать разгул своей жестокости.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Ela estava insatisfeita. Ela estava entediada, de não ser capaz de deixar seu próprio poder e sua própria crueldade correrem selvagemente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這是不滿。對無法盡情解放自身所有的力量與殘酷之事，深感厭煩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这是不满。对无法尽情解放自身所有的力量与残酷之事，深感厌烦。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Irritated by her predecessor's furniture telling her to act with restraint, her discontent was at its peak.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......And this furniture of the predecessor, who was telling her to act with prudence, gloomily bore the brunt of her dissatisfaction.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Irritada pela mobília de sua Predecessora estar lhe dizendo para agir com coibição, seu descontentamento alcançou o pico.

Chinese Simplified (CN): ……先代家具叫她自重的烦人言语，令她的不满到达了顶点。

Speaker: Lucifer
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]

Steam (ST): Thanks to their paired measurements, the Chiester Sisters were able to instantly calculate the terrain throughout the mansion and the coordinates of their targets, as well as a firing curve to reach them.
Umineko Project (UP): The Chiester sisters, through their mutual measurements, were able to instantly calculate the terrain inside the mansion and the coordinates of their targets, as well as a firing curve to reach them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Siesta sisters, through their mutual measurements, were able to instantly calculate the terrain inside the mansion and the coordinates of their targets, as well as a firing curve to reach them.
PC Japanese (JP): シエスタの姉妹は相互測量により、瞬時に屋敷内の地形と標的の座標、そしてそこへ至る射撃曲線を計算する。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As irmãs Chiester, através de suas medidas mútuas, eram capazes de calcular instantaneamente o terreno dentro da mansão e as coordenadas de seus alvos, bem como uma curva de disparo para alcançá‐los.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 谢丝塔姐妹通过彼此的测量，瞬间计算出了大屋内的地形、目标的坐标，以及直至目标的射击曲线。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Sim, seus tiros poderiam ser guiados para desenhar uma linha curva.{n}Ninguém seria capaz de escapar deles.

Chinese Simplified (CN): …对，她俩能将射击路径制导成曲线。{n}任何人都无法逃脱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sì, I loro colpi potevano essere guidati per disegnare una linea curva. Nessuno sarebbe capace di evitarli.

Steam (ST): The precision guidance used by the Seven Sisters of Purgatory was nothing more than a cheap knockoff of the ability these two held.
Umineko Project (UP): The precision homing ability of the Seven Sisters of Purgatory was nothing more than a cheap version of the ability these two held.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The precision guidance ability of the Seven Sisters of Purgatory was nothing more than a cheap version of the ability these two held.
PC Japanese (JP): 煉獄の七姉妹の精密誘導能力は、彼女たちの能力の廉価版でしかないのだ。
Russian (RU): Способность к точному направлению семи сестёр чистилища была не более чем дешёвой версией способности этой ушастой пары.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A habilidade de precisão de orientação das Sete Irmãs do Purgatório era nada mais que uma versão barata da habilidade que essas duas possuíam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 煉獄七姐妹的精密制導能力，只不過是她倆能力的廉價版。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 炼狱七姐妹的精密制导能力，只不过是她俩能力的廉价版。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'abilità di precisione delle Sette Sorelle del Purgatorio non era niente di più che una versione dozzinale dell'abilità che possedevano quelle due.

Speaker: Chiester45
Steam (ST): "45, Firing Preparations Concluded. Ammo Type Selected and Loaded."
Umineko Project (UP): "45, firing preparations complete. Ammo selected, now loading."

Steam (ST): As the two of them faced each other, it was as though they were both pulling back a bowstring together...
Umineko Project (UP): The two of them faced each other, and, as though they were both pulling back a bowstring together,
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the two of them faced each other. And as though they were both pulling back a bowstring together.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女たち二人が向かい合うように。そしてまるで、ひとつの弓を互いに引き合うように。
Russian (RU): Тут пара повернулась к друг другу, а затем, словно мимы, обе натянули невидимую тетиву лука.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As duas se olharam e, como se estivessem ambas puxando para trás a corda de um arco em sincronia,
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她倆轉身，面面相對。然後做出了，猶如兩人共同拉開同一張弓的動作。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她俩转身，面面相对。然后做出了，犹如两人共同拉开同一张弓的动作。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le due si misero l'una di fronte all'altra. Come se stessero entrambe tirando la corda di un arco insieme.

Steam (ST): ...A dazzling gold arrow was readied there.
Umineko Project (UP): ...there, a dazzling golden arrow was readied.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...There, a dazzling gold arrow was readied.
PC Japanese (JP): …そこに眩い黄金の矢が構えられる。
Russian (RU): ...Стоило им это сделать, и возникла готовая ослепительная золотая стрела.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...ali, um estonteante arco dourado foi preparado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …在那裡，眩目的黃金之箭蓄勢待發。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …在那里，眩目的黄金之箭蓄势待发。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ecco, una freccia abbagliante d'oro era stata preparata.

Speaker: Chiester410
Steam (ST): "410, nihi. Firing."
Umineko Project (UP): "410, nihi. Firing."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
Russian (RU): "410, нихи. Огонь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "410, nihi. Disparando."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "410, nihi. Fuoco."

Steam (ST): After giving that announcement, they released a single arrow together.
Umineko Project (UP): After they proclaimed that they were firing, together, they released a single arrow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女たちが射撃を宣言すると、二人で一本の矢が放たれる。
Russian (RU): Объявив, что открывают огонь, они пустили одну‐единственную стрелу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois que elas proclamaram que estavam disparando, juntas, elas liberaram uma única flecha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 隨著她的射擊宣言，兩人一同放出了那一支箭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 随着她的射击宣言，两人一同放出了那一支箭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo che proclamarono che stavano sparando, insieme, scoccarono una singola freccia.

Steam (ST): As the path taken by the gold-sparkling snake of light drew a curve, it followed the direction that Rudolf and Kyrie had escaped to in rapid pursuit.
Umineko Project (UP): As the curve taken by the gold‐sparkling snake of light drew a trail, it headed in the direction Rudolf and Kyrie had run, in rapid pursuit.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the curve taken by the gold-sparkling snake of light drew a locus, it followed the direction that Rudolf and Kyrie had escaped to in rapid pursuit.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金色に輝く光の蛇が美しい曲線の軌跡を描きながら、それは留弗夫たちが逃げた方へ高速で追跡していく。
Russian (RU): Пущенная стрела, рисуя сверкающие золотом змеиные кривые лини, стремительно полетела в погоню в направлении побега Рудольфа с Кирие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto a curva tomada pela cobra de luz de dourado‐cintilante desenhava uma trilha, ela seguia na direção que Rudolf e Kyrie tinham corrido, em rápida perseguição.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金色的光之蛇邊描繪著美麗的曲線軌跡，邊朝著留弗夫與霧江逃跑的方向高速追踪而去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金色的光之蛇边描绘着美丽的曲线轨迹，边朝着留弗夫与雾江逃跑的方向高速追踪而去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come la curva presa dallo scintillante serpente dorato disegnò un locus, seguì in una veloce ricerca la direzione in cui Rudolf e Kyrie erano scappati.

Steam (ST): It turned through the corridors, crawled over the floor, chasing them as it drew a beautiful curve.
Umineko Project (UP): It turned through the corridors, crawled over the floor, chasing them as it drew a beautiful curve.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It turned through the corridors, crawled over the floor, chasing them as it drew a beautiful curve.
PC Japanese (JP): 廊下を曲がり、床を這い、美しい曲線を描きながら追って行く。
Russian (RU): Она огибала повороты коридоров, ползла по полу и преследовала их, рисуя прекрасную кривую линию.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela virou pelos corredores, rastejou pelo piso, perseguindo‐os enquanto desenhava belas curvas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 轉過走廊，爬過地板，描繪著美麗的曲線地追了上去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 转过走廊，爬过地板，描绘着美丽的曲线地追了上去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Girò nei corridoi, strisciò sul pavimento, seguendoli, mentre disegnava una splendida curva.

Steam (ST): No one could block the guided shots of the Chiester Sisters. No one could escape from them. And their strength could pierce all physical and magical defenses.
Umineko Project (UP): No one could block the Chiester Sisters' homing projectiles. No one could escape them. And their strength could pierce all physical and magical defenses.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No one could block the guided shots of the Siesta Sisters. No one could escape them. And their strength could pierce all physical and magical defenses.
PC Japanese (JP): シエスタ姉妹の誘導弾は誰も防げない。逃れられない。そして物理的魔法的なあらゆる防御を強力に貫通できる。
Russian (RU): Никто не мог отразить наводящиеся выстрелы сестёр Чиест. Никто не мог скрыться от них. А сила их выстрелов могла пронзить все физические и магические барьеры.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ninguém podia bloquear os projéteis orientados das Irmãs Chiester. Ninguém podia escapar deles. E sua força podia penetrar todas as defesas físicas e mágicas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 謝絲塔姐妹的制導射擊無人能擋。無人能逃。並且，它能強力貫穿物理與魔法上的各種防御。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 谢丝塔姐妹的制导射击无人能挡。无人能逃。并且，它能强力贯穿物理与魔法上的各种防御。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nessuno poteva bloccare i proiettili guidati delle Sorelle Chiester. Nessuno poteva evitarli. E la loro forza poteva perforare ogni barriera fisica e magica.

Steam (ST): ...It was quite a merciless guided weapon of certain death.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was an all‐too‐merciless guided weapon of certain death.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......It was quite a merciless guided weapon of certain death.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それはあまりに無慈悲な必殺の誘導兵器。
Russian (RU): ......Таково было крайне беспощадное самонаводящееся орудие неминуемой смерти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Era uma arma guiada sem‐piedade‐alguma de morte certa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……此乃殘酷無情，必致目標於死地的制導兵器。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……此乃残酷无情，必致目标于死地的制导兵器。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era un'arma guidata piuttosto spietata di morte certa.

Steam (ST): However, among mythical-class soldiers, it was a weapon used by pretty much everyone. It was very commonplace for them...and very extraordinary for those of the everyday world.
Umineko Project (UP): However, among mythical‐class soldiers, it was a weapon used by pretty much everyone. It was very commonplace for them, ...and very extraordinary for those of the everyday world.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, among mythical-class soldiers, it was a weapon used by pretty much everyone. It was very commonplace for them, ...and very extraordinary for those of the everyday world.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、神話級の兵士ならば、誰もが割りと持つ武器なのだ。彼女らにとってはあまりに平凡で、…そして俗世にある者にとってあまりに非凡。
Russian (RU): Однако среди солдат мифического класса подобное орудие применялось практически всеми. Оно было довольно обычным для них и крайне необыкновенным для проживающих в повседневном мире.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, entre soldados de classe‐mítica, era uma arma usada por quase todo mundo. Era muito comum para eles, ...e muito extraordinário para aqueles do mundo ordinário.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，對神話級士兵來說，這是基本上人人都有的武器。對她們來說是極其的平凡，…而對俗世之人來說，卻是極其的非凡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，对神话级士兵来说，这是基本上人人都有的武器。对她们来说是极其的平凡，…而对俗世之人来说，却是极其的非凡。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Comunque, fra i soldati della classe mitica, era un'arma usata più o meno da tutti. Per loro era molto banale... e davvero straordinaria per le persone normali.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Wh-What the...?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Wh‐what the...?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Wh, what the...!?"
Russian (RU): "Чт‐что за?!"

Steam (ST): When he noticed something rapidly chasing them and turned around...
Umineko Project (UP): When he noticed something rapidly chasing them, and turned around...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 何かが高速で追ってくることに気付き、振り返った時。
Russian (RU): Когда они заметили нечто стремительно преследующее их и развернулись...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando ele percebeu algo perseguindo‐os rapidamente, e virou‐se...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在留弗夫感到有什麼東西高速追來，而回頭一看時。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在留弗夫感到有什么东西高速追来，而回头一看时。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando notò qualcosa che li stava inseguendo rapidamente, e si girò...

Steam (ST): The exact position of Rudolf's heart was pierced by the gold snake. It all happened in an instant.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf was shot straight through the location of his heart by the gold snake. It all happened in an instant.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rudolf was shot straight through where his heart was located by the gold snake. It all happened in an instant.
PC Japanese (JP): その黄金の蛇によって、留弗夫は心臓の位置を正確に撃ち抜かれた。一瞬の出来事だった。
Russian (RU): Золотая змея с ужасающей меткостью прострелила Рудольфу сердце. Всё произошло мгновенно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rudolf foi atingido direto através do local de seu coração pela cobra dourada. Isso tudo aconteceu em um instante.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這條黃金蛇，就已準確無誤地射中了留弗夫的心臟。只是一瞬間的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这条黄金蛇，就已准确无误地射中了留弗夫的心脏。只是一瞬间的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rudolf venne colpito esattamente dove si trovava il suo cuore dal serpente dorato. Accadde tutto in un istante.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "R-Rudolf-san...?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "R‐Rudolf‐san......?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "R, Rudolf-san......?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「る、留弗夫さん……？！」
Russian (RU): "Р‐Рудольф‐сан?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "R‐Rudolf‐san.....?!"
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "R-Rudolf-san...?!"

Steam (ST): After the gold snake pierced Rudolf, it swooped down to the floor, drawing a beautiful spiral, coiled itself around Kyrie's legs, and crawled up to her chest.
Umineko Project (UP): After the gold snake ran Rudolf through, it swooped down to the floor, drawing a beautiful spiral, coiled itself around Kyrie's legs, and crawled up to her chest.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After the gold snake pierced Rudolf, it swooped down to the floor, drawing a beautiful spiral, coiled itself around Kyrie's legs, and crawled up to her chest.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金の蛇は留弗夫を貫いた後、美しい螺旋を描きながら床に舞い降りて、霧江の足に絡みつくようにして胸まで這い登る。
Russian (RU): Разделавшись с Рудольфом, золотая змея приземлилась на пол и нарисовала прекрасную спираль, обвившись вокруг ноги Кирие и заползя ей на грудь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois que a cobra dourada atravessou Rudolf, ela arrebatou em direção ao piso, desenhando uma bela espiral, serpenteou ao redor das pernas de Kyrie e rastejou até o peito dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金蛇貫穿留弗夫後，描繪著美麗的螺旋，降至地面，纏上霧江的腳，轉著圈地爬到胸口。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金蛇贯穿留弗夫后，描绘着美丽的螺旋，降至地面，缠上雾江的脚，转着圈地爬到胸口。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo che il serpente dorato perforò Rudolf, piombò giù nel pavimento, disegnando una bellissima spirale, si attorcigliò attorno alla gamba di Kyrie, e strisciò sino al petto.

Steam (ST): And just like Rudolf, it pierced the exact location of her heart.
Umineko Project (UP): And just like Rudolf, it shot straight through the location of her heart.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And just like Rudolf, it shot straight through the location of her heart.
PC Japanese (JP): そして留弗夫と同じく心臓の位置を正確に撃ち抜いた。
Russian (RU): И так же как и Рудольфу, она пробила ей сердце.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E assim como Rudolf, ela perfurou direto através da localização do coração dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，與殺留弗夫時一樣，準確無誤地命中了心臟。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，与杀留弗夫时一样，准确无误地命中了心脏。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E proprio come per Rudolf, sparò dritto alla posizione del cuore.

Steam (ST): ...And all of that happened in an instant. It pierced Rudolf, and then Kyrie.
Umineko Project (UP): ...And all of that, too, happened in an instant.{n}It impaled Rudolf, and it impaled Kyrie.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...And all of that happened in an instant. It pierced Rudolf, and pierced Kyrie.
PC Japanese (JP): …それは何れも一瞬の出来事。留弗夫を貫き、霧江を貫く。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …それは何れも一瞬の出来事。{n}留弗夫を貫き、霧江を貫く。
Russian (RU): ...Всё это заняло лишь мгновение.{n}Она проткнула Рудольфа с Кирие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Tudo aquilo também aconteceu em um instante.{n}Ela empalou Rudolf, e empalou Kyrie.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這些，全都發生在一瞬之間。{n}貫穿留弗夫，貫穿霧江。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这些，全都发生在一瞬之间。{n}贯穿留弗夫，贯穿雾江。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E tutto questo successe in un istante. Perforò Rudolf, e perforò Kyrie.

Steam (ST): So they died, dropped to their knees, and fell over at almost the exact same time.
Umineko Project (UP): So they died at almost the same time, dropped to their knees at the same time, and fell over at the same time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So they died at almost the same time, dropped to their knees at the same time, and fell over at the same time.
PC Japanese (JP): だから二人はほぼ同時に絶命し、同時に膝を落として同時に倒れた。
Russian (RU): Они умерли практически в одно и то же время, одновременно упав на колени и одновременно рухнув на пол.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles morreram quase ao mesmo tempo, caíram de joelhos ao mesmo tempo, desabando ao mesmo tempo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，兩人幾乎是同時喪命，同時彎膝，同時倒下。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，两人几乎是同时丧命，同时弯膝，同时倒下。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi morirono quasi nello stesso momento, caddero in ginocchia nello stesso momento, e crollarono a terra nello stesso momento.

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...What's thiiis? Talk about overwhelming, ahhahahahahahahahahahahaha! Ridiculously easy, isn't it? Kuhhihihyahyahyahyahya! This is the kind of furniture I need. Way different from Predecessor-sama's second-hand furniture!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......What is thiiis? So overwhelming, ahhaha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}hahaha! That was ridiculously easy, wasn't it? Kuhhihihya{0}hya{0}hya{0}hyahya! This is the kind of furniture I need. Way different from my predecessor's second‐hand furniture!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......What's thiiis? So overwhelming, ahhahahahahahahahahahahaha! Ridiculously easy, isn't it. Kuhhihihyahyahyahyahya! This is the kind of furniture I need. Way different from Predecessor-sama's second-hand furniture!
PC Japanese (JP): 「……何これぇ？　圧倒的じゃない、あっははははははははははは！　馬鹿馬鹿しいくらいにあっさりね。くっひひひゃひゃひゃひゃひゃ！　私にはこういう家具が向いてるわ。先代さまの中古家具とは大違い！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……何これぇ？　圧倒的じゃない、あっははははははははははは！　馬鹿馬鹿しいくらいにあっさりね。くっひひひゃひゃひゃひゃひゃ！　私にはこういう家具が向いてるわ。先代さまの中古家具とは大違い！」
Russian (RU): "......Как та‐а‐ак? Столь превосходно, аха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха! Смехотворно легко, не так ли? Ку‐хи‐хи‐хья‐хья‐хья‐хья! Вот такая мебель мне и нужна. Не то что второсортная мебель госпожи Предшественницы!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......O que é iiisso? Tão opressivo, ahhaha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}hahaha! Isso foi ridiculamente fácil, não foi? Kuhhihihya{0}hya{0}hya{0}hyahya! É deste tipo de mobília que preciso. Bem diferente da mobília de segunda mão da minha predecessora!"
